info.title: Orbo Video Alarm System
info.description: Open source video alarm system with motion detection and Telegram integration

post.description: Authenticate with username and password to receive a JWT token

get.description: Check authentication status and get current user info

put.description: Update camera configuration. Device can only be changed when camera is inactive.

post.description: Disable alerts for this camera. Detection pipeline still runs for bounding boxes but no events are created or notifications sent.
Enable alerts for this camera. Detection pipeline will create events and send notifications.

get.description: Capture a single frame from camera as base64

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return

get.description: Get forensic face analysis thumbnail (NSA-style with landmarks) for a motion event
Get captured frame for motion event as base64

post.description: Start motion detection on all active cameras

get.description: Liveness probe endpoint - indicates if the service is alive
Readiness probe endpoint - indicates if the service is ready to serve traffic
